Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Neilian Drive, north of the Neilian Boat Rental Shop.
Room.LongDescription: Although you cannot get into the Neilian Boat Rental Shop from here, a sign proudly advertises their products. You can enter the plaza from the west off of Avatar Boulevard. The Neilian Boat Rental Shop will rent you a boat for a small deposit, so that you can explore the river and all the dangers therein.
